name: Name
recommend_max_ten_life_areas: We recommend keeping the number of life areas around 10 for the best overview.
local_storage_not_available: Warning: Local Storage is not available. Your data will not be saved.
unsaved_changes_warning: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to continue?
remove_life_area_warning: Warning: This will remove the life area and all its data. Do you want to continue?
reset_life_compass_warning: Are you sure you want to reset the life areas to default?
remove_all_life_areas_warning: Warning: This will remove all life areas and all data. Do you want to continue?
life_compass_subtitle: Discover your life balance. Create your life compass.
attribution_message: This application was built with care using modern frameworks and tools. We are grateful to the open source community and all contributors for providing the resources that made this project possible.
brief_life_compass_instruction_1: The Life Compass typically contains ten areas that are important for most people. In each box, write a few words about what you value or consider important in that specific area. Each area also includes two ratings. In the upper box, indicate how important each area is in your life on a scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is not important and 10 is very important. Imagine how your life would be if everything looked exactly as you wished.
brief_life_compass_instruction_2: In the lower box, indicate how much you have lived in accordance with your values during the past week, where 1 means you haven't lived by your values at all and 10 means you have fully lived by your values. Then examine the differences between the numbers. Can you identify areas that are important to you but where you do not live as you would like? Consider what might be holding you back!
importance_help: Specify how important this area is in your life on a scale of 1-10, where 1 means not important and 10 means very important. Consider how your life would be if everything looked exactly as you wished.
satisfaction_help: Specify how much you have lived in accordance with your values over the past week, where 1 means you haven't lived by your values at all and 10 means you have fully lived by your values.
onboarding.welcome_prompt:
Welcome to Life Compass!
Let's start the onboarding. Would you like to begin with predefined life areas?
(You can always run the tutorial again from the settings menu.)
onboarding.toolbar_tooltip: Take a look at the floating toolbar in the bottom right. It gives you quick access to actions like adding predefined life areas, resetting, exporting/importing data, and toggling the radar view.
onboarding.settings_tooltip: Take a look at the settings menu in the top right. You can access the tutorial, change the language, and more.
introduction.what_is_description: Life Compass is a tool to reflect on what is truly important in your life. Instead of being driven by short-term goals or external expectations, it helps you identify your core values – what you stand for and how you want to live your life.
introduction.why_description: Having clear values provides direction and motivation in life. Without them, we might feel lost or unsure about our choices. With a Life Compass, you can navigate challenges, make decisions, and live more in line with what is meaningful to you.
introduction.how_description: You reflect on various areas of life, such as:
introduction.how_family: Family & Relationships: How do you want to be as a partner, parent, or friend?
introduction.how_work: Work & Career: What is most important to you in your work?
introduction.how_health: Health & Well-being: How do you take care of yourself physically and mentally?
introduction.how_leisure: Leisure & Personal Development: What makes you happy and engaged?
introduction.examples_description: A value is not a goal but a direction. Examples:
introduction.examples_family: Relationships: "I want to be a present and caring friend."
introduction.examples_work: Work: "I want to contribute to something meaningful and grow in my profession."
introduction.examples_health: Health: "I want to prioritize my health through regular exercise and recovery."
introduction.next_steps_description: By exploring your own Life Compass, you can begin acting in line with your values and create a more meaningful life. Click on "Start your journey" to get started!
introduction.privacy_description: We respect your privacy. We do not track any of your actions or what you write. All your data remains local and is not shared with any external party.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Your privacy is very important to us. We are committed to protecting your personal data. This application is designed to respect your privacy by processing all data locally in your browser.
privacyPolicy.dataStorage: All the information you provide is stored locally in your browser's local storage. This means that your data is only available on the device you use and is not transmitted over the internet.
privacyPolicy.noTracking: We do not track any of your actions or behaviors within the application. There are no tracking cookies or analytics services embedded in this app.
privacyPolicy.noCookies: This application does not use cookies for tracking or storing personal data.
privacyPolicy.dataExport: You can export your data at any time using the export function available in the app. If you wish to clear all your data, you can simply clear your browser’s local storage.
privacyPolicy.userControl: You have complete control over your data. It remains securely on your device, and you can export or delete it at any time by clearing your browser’s local storage.
privacyPolicy.closing: If you have any questions or concerns about your privacy, please feel free to contact us.

onboarding.privacy_notice: We value your privacy. None of your actions or inputs are tracked; all data remains on your device.
